message: I'm feeling generous, but let's make it a bit more even. This offer won't be on the table for long!
You had your chance, now it's my turn again. Think carefully!
Time is running out!  This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm still here. You're running out of time!
Okay, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical solution. Take it before inflation eats away at this deal any further!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll take a bit more, thanks!
